room_title: Escape room "Zombie Panic" by Alcatraz Escape Games in Salt Lake City
review: So awesome! I loved how there were multiple rooms integrated in and of course loved the interaction with the characters! Those zombies are scary! I would recommend this to everyone!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Panic" by Alcatraz Escape Games in Salt Lake City
review: Zombie room was awesome, we had such a great time! Kate was the best and our Zombie killed it! Thanks for the great time!!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Panic" by Alcatraz Escape Games in Salt Lake City
review: I visited Alcatraz with a large group as a team builder for our company. The experience was great! It was a very enjoyable, thrilling hour spent with co-workers. It really was a great exercise in teamwork, while being fun and scary at the same time. Our Zombie, Emily and our moderator, Brock were amazing! I highly recommend this place!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Panic" by Alcatraz Escape Games in Salt Lake City
review: Went to the Zombie room and loved it! The atmosphere was so intense and the puzzle was so intricate and entertaining. Our moderator, Turner, did an incredible job and the zombie, Broc, played his part well! 10/10 would go again

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Panic" by Alcatraz Escape Games in Salt Lake City
review: We went with a group of 12 friends for my bday last night and did the zombie room. It was excellent! We all left very pleased and ready to do another room. It was intense and difficult, but so much fun. Mckenzie was an amazing zombie and I can't remember our tour guides name, but he was awesome too. Thanks for a great time!
